REICH YOUTH LEADER ASSURES CHRISTIANS; Baldur von Schirach Declares Meetings of His Group Will Not Interfere With Church.

Dec. 10, 1936

See the article in its original context from

December 10, 1936 , Page 18Buy Reprints

TimesMachine is an exclusive benefit for home delivery and digital subscribers.

Full text is unavailable for this digitized archive article. Subscribers may view the full text of this article in its original form through TimesMachine.

BERLIN, Dec. 9. -- Baldur von Schirach, Reich youth leader, in a broadcast this evening which 6,000,000 Hitler Youth members were ordered to hear either at home or at special assemblies, undertook to reassure Christian parents. He declared that in the future there would be no Hitler Youth exercises Sunday mornings or any other time calculated to interfere with attendance at religious ceremonies.
